'''Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival''' is a [[Flagship Event]] in [[Version 5.4]].

==Event Details==
{{Description
|title=[[File:Icon Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival.png|30px]] Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival
|[[Yae Publishing House]] is holding the "[[Mikawa Flower Festival]]" once more, this time riding on the coattails of your and [[Paimon]]'s acclaim. Aiming to combine human ingenuity with [[youkai]] arts to offer the most innovative and thrilling entertainment of our time, this year's festival is open to all humans and youkai throughout the land...
|[[Map]] description
}}

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 30 or above
* Complete the [[Archon Quest]] "[[Ritou Escape Plan]]"
* Complete the [[Story Quest]]s "[[Imperatrix Umbrosa Chapter]]: Act II ([[Raiden Shogun]])," "[[Tapirus Somniator Chapter]]: Act I ([[Yumemizuki Mizuki]]), " "[[Dracaena Somnolenta Chapter]]: Act I ([[Sangonomiya Kokomi]])," and "[[Carassius Auratus Chapter]]: Act II ([[Yoimiya]])" as well as [[Yoohoo Art: Seichou no Jutsu|Hangout Event: Sayu]] and the [[World Quest]] "[[Sacred Sakura Cleansing Ritual]]" to get the best experience from this event.

===Summary===
* During the event, the following gameplay modes will unlock in the given sequence: "Akitsu Harpastum: Dreams Doubled," "A Little Fox's Daydream," and "Bunshin Phantasm."
* In the "[[Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival/Akitsu Harpastum: Dreams Doubled|Akitsu Harpastum: Dreams Doubled]]" gameplay, you must return harpasta fired at you by the Harpastum Youkai and defeat them under various conditions and time limits.
* In the "[[Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival/A Little Fox's Daydream|A Little Fox's Daydream]]" gameplay, You are required to gather the required number of "Fried Tofus" by switching between dreamscape types and altering the terrain. You must navigate your way past perils and guide the little kitsune to gather the "Fried Tofus" and reach the ramen stall.
* In the "[[Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival/Bunshin Phantasm|Bunshin Phantasm]]" gameplay, you must use two mysterious doppelgangers wisely to solve various problems and find your way to the destination.
* Complete the event's various gameplay modes to gain [[Festival Stamp]]s. Reach a certain amount of Festival Stamps to obtain [[Tamayuratei no Ohanashi]] (Polearm), [[Primogem]]s, [[Crown of Insight]], event-exclusive [[Weapon Refinement Material]]s, and other rewards.
